article: George selected his food in Value Mart carefully. He estimated he had  _  80 cents today. He was pleased he had got good  _  for his money again. Then he thought they must have been  _  somewhere in the store. George had bought the black gloves for $35 ten years ago. They were leather, soft and durable. Until then, he had worn cheaper man-made material that never lasted long. His  _  to buy the gloves turned out to be good, which even  _  his position on the bus, as poorer passengers stared at him  _  . George re-entered the store. It did not take long to be  _  that the gloves were not there. His  _  grew heavier."People have changed",he  _  ."Years ago, if somebody  picked up  something lost, they would give it back." Yet he did not give up .This time he focused on the gloves on other shoppers'  _  .Suddenly he  _  a lady nearby wearing a black pair of gloves. He said"Hi !"But when the surprised lady returned his  _  , his eyes dropped to the floor, for the fingers of her gloves were too small for him. Without gloves, he had to  _  his hands into his sleeves. Back home, George was  _  . He could not do without gloves. George decided to buy another leather pair. But before that, he stepped into Value Mart again to see if by any  _  his gloves hand been returned to the lost and found office. The girl looked into her drawer and took out a pair of men's leather gloves."Are they ?" "Yes ! Mine !"George shouted with joy.
